ygData.subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Necro AC
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t worry about ac really until about lvl 20 or so..my necro went thru 26 levels with mostly cloth and a few int and mana items...Necros are lucky, we don t
ygData.messageBody:
Don't worry about ac really until about lvl 20 or so..my necro went thru 26 levels with mostly cloth and a few int and mana items...Necros are lucky, we don't need much to sustain us at early levels..save ur money for spells until you have some excess cash then go looking for those magic clothing items...u may be able to get them yourself if you learn to use all of your spells and your pet wisely..
 
Maime Shadowhand, Seekers of Lore
47th Chamber of Death
The Rathe
-- Death is the only way out!
----- Original Message -----
From: V.K.
To: _EQ_Magic@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2001 12:36 AM
Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Necro AC

Greetings all,

I have a question for all of you, I have a 10th Level Erudite Necro on the
Rathe server.

My question is this, what can I do to increase his AC?

I have some cash, but not much and haven't as yet taken him beyond Toxx
forest.

Thanks for the help,


Tarvos

Cananen, Mage of the 15th Tier,  The Rathe
Memidyen, Druid of 8 seasons, Vazalle
Eskil, Shaman of 7 winters, Zebuxoruk
Donn, 10th circle Necromancer, The Rathe
